entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
